title: U.S. states with state cyber bullying laws as of November 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law, and a y axis representing State totals.
The highest category is found at School_policy where State totals is 49.0.
The lowest category is found at Includes_off-campus where State totals is 17.0.

data.Category Of Cyber Bullying Law: Includes cyber bullying or online harassment
Criminal Sanction for cyber bullying or electronic harassment

gold: This statistic presents the number of US states with state cyber bullying laws , by policy implementation . As of November 2018 , 48 states had electronic harassment laws which explicitly included cyber bullying . A total of 44 states included criminal sanctions in their cyber bullying laws .
